game.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.player.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents one of the players of Settlers of Catan.
    Author:
    Christoph Hermann

        public int visitRoad(java.util.ArrayList<Edge> blackRoads,
                     Road vRoad,
                     Corner corner1)
        Recursively called function to calculate the longest road
        Parameters:
        blackRoads - roads just visited, you need this to avoid circles
        vRoad - momentarily regarded road
        corner1 - you need this to avoid going backwards
        Returns:
        counter2

      • updateAvialableCorners

        public void updateAvialableCorners(Corner corner)
        checks if a availableCorner is next to the given corner. If so then the availableCorner gets removed form the ArrayList of avialableCorners
        Parameters:
        corner - a corner

      • updateAvialableEdges

        public void updateAvialableEdges(Edge edge)
        checks if a availableEdge is the same as the given corner. If so then the availableEdge gets removed form the ArrayList of avialableEdges
        Parameters:
        edge - an edge
